pkgmetadata.longdescription: Media Player written in C++ and Qt. Network can optionally be enabled to autodetect other running instances, in order to tell that one to show itself instead of opening a new one. Although it's called network, media-sound/qbitmplayer doesn't actually do any network related stuff, it just opens a local server for subsequent calls to media-sound/qbitmplayer to connect to it. That's the mechanism it uses to detect running instances.

use.flag: Allow a single instance of itself, thus subsequent calls to media-sound/qbitmplayer will just open the already opened instance of it.
Make media-sound/qbitmplayer not just a Music Player, but a Media Player by enabling its ability to play video files as well.
